Question: Xinyi Electric Storage (Shenzhen) Co. Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Xinyi Electric Storage (Shenzhen) Co. Ltd

CES 2024

- Model: XES-CESS
- Capacity: 500KVA/307KWh
- Lithium battery power system
- Provides non-fossil energy for construction sites
- Can power tower cranes, pumps, desander machines, and arc welders
- Reduces carbon footprint by up to 85%
- 32x quieter than fossil fuel generators
- Eliminates diesel handling and usage risks
- Maintenance-free
- Economically justified for operational cost savings
Summary_cn:
新宜电储能（深圳）有限公司

CES 2024

- 型号：XES-CESS
- 容量：500KVA/307KWh
- 锂电池电力系统
- 为建筑工地提供非化石能源
- 可为塔式起重机、泵、除砂机和电弧焊机提供电力
- 可将碳足迹减少多达85％
- 转换功率时比化石燃料发电机静音32倍
- 消除柴油处理和使用风险
- 免维护
- 经济上能为运营成本节省提供合理证明
